Package tournament

Class UniformRandom

  • java.lang.Object
    • tournament.Player
      • tournament.UniformRandom

  • public class UniformRandom
extends Player
    Sample agent that uses a uniform random strategy. Remember to put your name in the author field, change the name of the agent, and make your own solveGame(MatrixGame,PlayerNumber) method.
    Version:
    2015.10.04
    Author:
    Oscar
